NAME: BlizzPatchNotes
AUTHOR: FlapJack
SHORT: Posts latest Blizzard game patch notes in chat.
DESCRIPTION:
Posts latest Blizzard game patch notes in chat.

Games supported:
Overwatch
Diablo3
Hearthstone
Heroes of the Storm
Starcraft2
World of Warcraft

Dependencies:
BeautifulSoup4 :: https://www.crummy.com/software/BeautifulSoup/bs4/doc/
pypandoc :: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pypandoc
Pandoc :: http://pandoc.org/
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing BlizzPatchNotes. BeautifulSoup4, pypandoc, and pandoc must be installed to use this cog. Pandoc is not installed automatically by the downloader cog. Find your install instructions at http://pandoc.org/installing.html.
